hero.title: Designing & Building Modern Homes in Portugal
hero.subtitle: At PDO Arquitetos, we create inspiring living spaces—
hero.subtitleLine2: crafted with precision, built with purpose.

about.text: At PDO Arquitetos, every project begins with dialogue. We listen, understand, and translate ideas into architecture that is thoughtful, functional, and responsive to its context. From concept to construction, we work closely with our clients, combining creativity and technical rigor to deliver spaces that are clear in purpose and timeless in design.

projects.title: Our Latest Projects
projects.allProjectsDescription: Our portfolio showcases thoughtfully designed projects that combine elegance, functionality, and innovation. From modern villas with open-plan concepts to elegant duplexes with private gardens and rooftop terraces, each project reflects our commitment to quality and contemporary living. We create spaces that inspire comfort, beauty, and sustainability.

builtByUs.title: Built by Pedro do Ó Arquitetos
builtByUs.allProjectsDescription: Discover our diverse portfolio of architectural projects, thoughtfully designed to combine elegance, functionality, and innovation. From modern villas with open-plan concepts to elegant duplexes with private gardens and rooftop terraces, each project reflects our commitment to quality and contemporary living. Explore how we bring unique visions to life through spaces that inspire comfort, beauty, and sustainability.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: We design and deliver modern, sustainable spaces that blend aesthetics with functionality. With a focus on quality, efficiency, and environmental responsibility, our team brings creative vision and technical skill to every stage of the project.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description1: We are a Portugal-based architecture and construction studio
aboutUs.description2: committed to designing and building high-quality residential homes.

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.description: We manage every step—from design to build—with 15+ years of expertise to ensure precision, trust, and peace of mind.

legacy.title: Legacy
legacy.description: Our homes blend sustainable innovation with Portuguese roots, crafted for how you live today and where you're headed tomorrow.

contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you're planning to buy a home or start a new residential project, we're just a message away.
